title: Refund Event Fields Schema
description: Defines the event fields our system recognizes as a refund event

order_id.title: Refunded Order ID
order_id.description: The order or transaction ID associated with the refunded purchase

PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.title: Order ID
PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.description: The order or transaction ID associated with this purchase

PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.title: Affiliation
PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.description: Store or affiliation from which this transaction occurred (e.g. Google Store)

PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.title: Purchase Total
PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.description: Revenue with discounts and coupons added in

PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.title: Revenue
PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.description: Revenue associated with the transaction (excluding shipping and tax). This is the field we use to calculate a customer's LTV.

PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.title: Shipping Cost
PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.description: Shipping cost associated with the transaction

PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.title: Total Tax
PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.description: Total tax associated with the transaction

PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.title: Currency
PurchaseEventFields.schema.json_properti.description: The ISO currency code used in this purchase

product_id.title: Product ID
product_id.description: Database id of the product being viewed

sku.title: Stock Keeping Unit
sku.description: Sku of the product being viewed

name.title: Product Name
name.description: Name of the product being viewed

price.title: Price
price.description: Price of the product being viewed

coupon.title: Coupon
coupon.description: Coupon code associated with a product (e.g MAY_DEALS_3)
